Who am I?

I was always the kid who took things apart and tried to put them back together. Almost all my hobbies are rooted in trying to wrap my head around a strategy or solve a problem in an interesting way. I have spent hours writing code on projects that I never really intended to be more than just answering the question of "How did they make that and can I improve it". My inspiration for code I write comes from experiences I have in the real world that feel more special than the day to day. I want the give the people using software I write the same feeling you get from seeing an unbelievable magic trick or taking your favorite ride at Disney Land. I think that the almost magical feeling of technology is a secret ingredient that seperates the top tech companies in the world from the rest. My biggest goal is to be one of the top minds in a field of technology and make siginficant changes to that field that improve the world.
